note: Hungarian- born Zen monk and teacher. Lives and practices at the Original Light Zen Temple, Pilis Mountains, Hungary. Teaches extensively in Asia, EU and USA.

name: meditation
value: mind and body practice to attain a higher state of conscriousness

name: awakening
value: becoming free from illusions and realize our true nature

name: wisdom
value: impart the teaching of One Mind to all interested beings

name: compassion
value: helping all beings attain their true nature
